text: Nicktoons Racing is a Nickelodeon racing game for the PlayStation, Game Boy Advance, Game Boy Color, Windows and arcade. This game was released in 1999. ==Playable characters== * Tommy Pickles (from Rugrats)(start) * Angelica Pickles (from Rugrats) (start) * Arnold (from Hey Arnold!) (start) * Helga Pataki (fromHey Arnold! (start) * Sid (from Hey Arnold!) (start) * Eliza Thornberry (from The Wild Thornberrys) (start) * Darwin Thornberry (from The Wild Thornberrys) (start) * Donnie Thornberry(from The Wild Thornberrys)(start) * CatDog (start) * Norbert and Daggett (from The Angry Beavers) (start) ==Places== * Reptar Raceway (Rugrats universe) * Dam Prix (The Angry Beavers universe) * Rancid Raceway (CatDog universe) * Bikini Bottom Blowout (SpongeBob SquarePants universe) * Race Madness (Ren & Stimpy universe) * Beaver Fever (The Angry Beavers universe) * Nearburg Rally (CatDog universe) * Safari Speedway (The Wild Thornberrys universe) * Monster Mania (Aaahh!!! Real Monsters universe) * Pickles' Parkway (Rugrats universe) * Gritty City Circuit (Hey Arnold! universe) * Bongo Bangup (The Wild Thornberrys universe) * Big City Clean Up (Hey Arnold! universe) * Beach Soccer (SpongeBob SquarePants universe) Category:1999 video games Category:Game Boy Advance games Category:Game Boy Color games Category:Nickelodeon Category:PlayStation games Category:Windows games
title: Nicktoons Racing
